replies.author: 稗田讚歌
replies.txt_content: 南瓜用斧子应该是常识了 阳光传感器应该也是斧头 剩下两个不清楚 都是用手撸的

replies.author: Windowsredstone
replies.txt_content:
第三个手撸

第四个……拿剑会稍微快0.5倍吧？

replies.author: 筱柒鸭
replies.txt_content: 斧子吧  玻璃我是手拆 中继器嘛 也是手拆

replies.author: Edgecho
replies.txt_content: 12斧子 3镐子 4一样

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content: 不ji到。。我都是用mek的原子分解机的。。。

replies.author: Drand
replies.txt_content: 斧头吧...

replies.author: ~King~
replies.txt_content: 斧稿稿稿？

replies.author: 正义Ren类
replies.txt_content: 实践出真知

replies.author: 无敌枪神555
replies.txt_content: 稿子更快

replies.author: A_vicii
replies.txt_content: 1斧头 2不知道 3镐子吧 4都一样

replies.author: xiaopangju
replies.txt_content:
emmmm
wiki有答案

replies.author: SayN0
replies.txt_content: 12斧头，3稿子，4都一样

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content:
不清楚呢
我小手一撸
他们就消失于虚空了

replies.author: S_Nitu
replies.txt_content: 斧头无误

replies.author: 战狂clanss
replies.txt_content: 1.2斧子 3.4空手

replies.author: Windowsredstone
replies.txt_content:
MC_tingfeng 发表于 2019-8-20 09:02
那我来个问题，原版工具挖萤石哪个最快
剑最快

什么剑都一样

replies.author: ziyuan36250
replies.txt_content: 差不多吧，看你自己

replies.author: 最好的初梦
replies.txt_content: 前两个都会用斧子，后两个通常是手撸

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content: 1、2斧头；3镐子；4镐子（因为我的镐子一般会附魔精准）
